==== Example ====

===== RSS embedding in wiki text =====

It is very simple to embed the widget and display feeds from any website.
Consider the following configuration in a wiki page:

<source>
{{#widget: RSS
 | feedURL = 'http://feeds.bbci.co.uk/news/technology/rss.xml'
 | showDescription = true
 | showDate = true
}}
</source>

The widget with this configuration will display the feeds from the BBC technology news website including description text and the dates of the feeds.

===== RSS widget embedding by auto-selection =====

RSS widget can also be embedded via auto-selection. This option is configured on the [[ Admin:Widgets | Widgets Configuration ]] page. You can find more information about automatic embedding of widgets in the [[ Help:WidgetConfiguration | corresponding help section]].
